SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

javax.jaxtx.acid
Interface Status

public interface Status

This enumeration represents the states that a transaction and participants may be in.

Version:
$Id: Status.java,v 1.1 2004/06/22 10:07:56 nmcl Exp $

Field Summary
static int ACTIVE
          The transaction/participant is active and has not yet begun to execute the two-phase commit protocol.
static int COMMITTED
          The transaction/participant has successfully committed.
static int COMMITTING
          The transaction/participant is executing the commit phase.
static int PREPARED
          The transaction/participant has successfully completed the prepare phase and has determined that it can commit.
static int PREPARING
          The transaction/participant is currently executing the prepare phase.
static int ROLLBACK_ONLY
          The transaction/participant is marked in such a way that the only outcome for it is to roll back.
static int ROLLED_BACK
          The transaction/participant has rolled back.
static int ROLLING_BACK
          The transaction/participant is currently rolling back.
 

Field Detail

ACTIVE

public static final int ACTIVE
The transaction/participant is active and has not yet begun to execute the two-phase commit protocol.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PREPARING

public static final int PREPARING
The transaction/participant is currently executing the prepare phase.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PREPARED

public static final int PREPARED
The transaction/participant has successfully completed the prepare phase and has determined that it can commit.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

COMMITTING

public static final int COMMITTING
The transaction/participant is executing the commit phase.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

COMMITTED

public static final int COMMITTED
The transaction/participant has successfully committed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ROLLING_BACK

public static final int ROLLING_BACK
The transaction/participant is currently rolling back. This does not imply that the prepare phase has been executed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ROLLED_BACK

public static final int ROLLED_BACK
The transaction/participant has rolled back.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ROLLBACK_ONLY

public static final int ROLLBACK_ONLY
The transaction/participant is marked in such a way that the only outcome for it is to roll back.
